Title: Guantanamera
Director: Tomás Gutiérrez Alea, Juan Carlos Tabío
Writer: Eliseo Alberto, Tomás Gutiérrez Alea, Juan Carlos Tabío
Actors: Carlos Cruz, Mirta Ibarra, Jorge Perugorría, Raúl Eguren
Plot: It is a satire about life in Cuba. The members of a funeral procession and some truckdrivers who have to take the same route begin to talk about god and the world ending up in discovering ...
